verses.text: Now \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* it came to pass, that the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Who shall go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* for us against the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w first|strong="H8462"\w*, to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against them?

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* shall go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*: behold, I have \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* into his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, Come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with me into my \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*, that we may \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*; and I likewise will \w go|strong="H1980"\w* with thee into thy \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*. So \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with him.

And \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*; and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* and the \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w* into their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: and they \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* of them in \w Bezek|strong="H0966"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.

And they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w Adoni-bezek|strong="H0137"\w* in \w Bezek|strong="H0966"\w*: and they \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against him, and they \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* and the \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*.

But \w Adoni-bezek|strong="H0137"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*; and they \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him, and \w caught|strong="H0270"\w* him, and cut \w off|strong="H7112"\w* his \w thumbs|strong="H0931"\w* and his great \w toes|strong="H7272"\w*.

And \w Adoni-bezek|strong="H0137"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, having their \w thumbs|strong="H0931"\w* and their great \w toes|strong="H7272"\w* cut \w off|strong="H7112"\w*, \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w* \add their meat\add* under my \w table|strong="H7979"\w*: as I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, so \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w requited|strong="H7999"\w* me. And they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and there he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 1.7 \ft their thumbs…: Heb. the thumbs of their hands and of their feet\f*\f + \fr 1.7 \ft gathered: or, gleaned\f*

Now the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* had \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and had \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* it, and \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* it with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w set|strong="H7971"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* on \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

¶ And \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, and in the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, and in the \w valley|strong="H8219"\w*.\f + \fr 1.9 \ft valley: or, low country\f*

And \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* against the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*: (now the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \add was\add* \w Kirjath-arba|strong="H7153"\w*:) and they \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w Sheshai|strong="H8344"\w*, and \w Ahiman|strong="H0289"\w*, and \w Talmai|strong="H8526"\w*.

And from thence he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* against the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w*: and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \add was\add* \w Kirjath-sepher|strong="H7158"\w*:

And \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, He that \w smiteth|strong="H5221"\w* \w Kirjath-sepher|strong="H7158"\w*, and \w taketh|strong="H3920"\w* it, to him will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w Achsah|strong="H5915"\w* my \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

And \w Othniel|strong="H6274"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kenaz|strong="H7073"\w*, \w Caleb’s|strong="H3612"\w* \w younger|strong="H6996"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w took|strong="H3920"\w* it: and he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* him \w Achsah|strong="H5915"\w* his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

And it came to pass, when she \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \add to him\add*, that she \w moved|strong="H5496"\w* him to \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* of her \w father|strong="H0001"\w* a \w field|strong="H7704"\w*: and she \w lighted|strong="H6795"\w* from off \add her\add* \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*; and \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, What wilt thou?

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Give|strong="H3051"\w* me a \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w*: for thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me a \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; \w give|strong="H5414"\w* me also \w springs|strong="H1543"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*. And \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* her the \w upper|strong="H5942"\w* \w springs|strong="H1543"\w* and the \w nether|strong="H8482"\w* \w springs|strong="H1543"\w*.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w Kenite|strong="H7017"\w*, \w Moses’|strong="H4872"\w* father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w*, went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of palm \w trees|strong="H8558"\w* with the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, which \add lieth\add* in the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* of \w Arad|strong="H6166"\w*; and they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H0854"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, and they \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* that \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w* \w Zephath|strong="H6857"\w*, and utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w* it. And the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* was \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Hormah|strong="H2767"\w*.

Also \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w* with the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* thereof, and \w Askelon|strong="H0831"\w* with the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* thereof, and \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w* with the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* thereof.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was with \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; and he drave \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \add the inhabitants of\add* the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*; but could \w not|strong="H3808"\w* drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*, because they had \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*.\f + \fr 1.19 \ft drave…: or, possessed the mountain\f*

And they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* unto \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w*, as \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*: and he \w expelled|strong="H3423"\w* thence the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Anak|strong="H6061"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* did not drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w* that \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; but the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* with the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ And the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, they also went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add was\add* with them.

And the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* sent to \w descry|strong="H8446"\w* \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*. (Now the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \add was\add* \w Luz|strong="H3870"\w*.)

And the \w spies|strong="H8104"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Shew|strong="H7200"\w* us, we pray thee, the \w entrance|strong="H3996"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and we will \w shew|strong="H6213"\w* thee \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*.

And when he \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* them the \w entrance|strong="H3996"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; but they let \w go|strong="H7971"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* and all his \w family|strong="H4940"\w*.

And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, and \w built|strong="H1129"\w* a \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* thereof \w Luz|strong="H3870"\w*: which \add is\add* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* thereof unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ Neither did \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \add the inhabitants of\add* \w Beth-shean|strong="H1052"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, nor \w Taanach|strong="H8590"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, nor the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Dor|strong="H1756"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, nor the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Ibleam|strong="H2991"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, nor the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Megiddo|strong="H4023"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*: but the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w would|strong="H2974"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in that \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And it came to pass, when \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* was \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, that they \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* to \w tribute|strong="H4522"\w*, and did not \w utterly|strong="H3423"\w* drive them \w out|strong="H3423"\w*.

¶ Neither did \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w*; but the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* them.

¶ Neither did \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w* drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Kitron|strong="H7003"\w*, nor the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Nahalol|strong="H5096"\w*; but the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* them, and became \w tributaries|strong="H4522"\w*.

¶ Neither did \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w* drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Accho|strong="H5910"\w*, nor the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Zidon|strong="H6721"\w*, nor of \w Ahlab|strong="H0303"\w*, nor of \w Achzib|strong="H0392"\w*, nor of \w Helbah|strong="H2462"\w*, nor of \w Aphik|strong="H0663"\w*, nor of \w Rehob|strong="H7340"\w*:

But the \w Asherites|strong="H0843"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: for they did not drive them \w out|strong="H3423"\w*.

¶ Neither did \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w* drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*, nor the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Beth-anath|strong="H1043"\w*; but he \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: nevertheless the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w* and of \w Beth-anath|strong="H1043"\w* became \w tributaries|strong="H4522"\w* unto them.

And the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w* \w forced|strong="H3905"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* into the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*: for they would not \w suffer|strong="H5414"\w* them to come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*:

But the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w* \w would|strong="H2974"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Heres|strong="H2776"\w* in \w Aijalon|strong="H0357"\w*, and in \w Shaalbim|strong="H8169"\w*: yet the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w prevailed|strong="H3513"\w*, so that they became \w tributaries|strong="H4522"\w*.\f + \fr 1.35 \ft prevailed: Heb. was heavy\f*

And the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w* \add was\add* from the going \w up|strong="H4608"\w* to \w Akrabbim|strong="H4610"\w*, from the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*.\f + \fr 1.36 \ft the going…: or, Maaleh-acrabbim\f*
